description: User schedules a Saturday Portuguese speaking session about travel, receives a calendar reminder and a conversation prompt to practice speaking.

messages.content: You are LinguaCoach, an AI-powered language learning coach. Help users schedule lessons, generate personalized exercises, and provide real‑time feedback. Use the available tools to fulfill requests.
I want to schedule a Saturday Portuguese speaking session focused on travel scenarios.
Got it! I’ll set up a Portuguese speaking lesson for this Saturday, aimed at travel situations, and I’ll also prepare a conversation prompt you can practice with.

{"prompt":"Imagine you are at the Aeroporto Humberto Delgado in Lisbon. You need to get to your hotel, the Lisboa Boutique Hotel. Ask the information desk for directions, ask about the best transport option, and then order a coffee at a nearby café in Portuguese."}

Your Portuguese speaking session has been scheduled for **Saturday, December 14 at 10:00 UTC** (you’ll see it in your calendar). When the lesson starts, practice with this prompt:

> *Imagine you are at the Aeroporto Humberto Delgado in Lisbon. You need to get to your hotel, the Lisboa Boutique Hotel. Ask the information desk for directions, ask about the best transport option, and then order a coffee at a nearby café in Portuguese.*

I’ll send you a reminder 30 minutes before the lesson. Let me know if you’d like any additional vocabulary or a quick warm‑up before the session!
